name: EchoingCat
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: echoing cat
des:
When you say something out loud, Amazon Echo will repeat. This skill will display the words said on the screen as well.
If you say an unrecognizable word, Amazon Echo will replace it with a different word.

Please use this function to understand your Amazon Echo and to develop your skills.
Thank you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
